name: HeadMan (IvanovTV)
description:
I found Game Maker 4 from 2003 and decided to make a game using it.

Game is about HeadMan -- dude, who does heroic stuff. Storyline is a parody of it's own, so don't expect too much from it.

All modern pixelart graphics and insane MIDI riffs are made by me. Except explosion.gif, which I took from game maker.

Sound sources: Most of sounds I took from game maker. Some sounds where stolen from power point 2007. Laugh sound is unique. I found it when I was messing around with MIDI percussion.

Used software: Obviously Game Maker 4. I've made most of the graphics using built in sprite editor, but sometimes I used MS Paint. Insane MIDI riffs were made in Anvil Studio. Also I used Audacity to tweak sounds I had.
